Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product holds significant value to you, worth $10000, and it's tailored to enhance your specific requirements. Considering its quality and the benefits it brings, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $9500. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or require further details, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
